description: This file implements a Todo List component/page using the Qwik framework. It includes logic for loading and adding list items, and renders the UI with form handling and styling.

classes.name: ListItem
classes.description: TypeScript interface defining the structure of a list item, which contains a 'text' property.

methods.name: useListLoader
methods.description: Loader function to retrieve the current list of items.

methods.name: useAddToListAction
methods.description: Action handler for adding a new item to the list with validation.
